messages.message: Hi! Can we please remove one of our incident postmortem doc from AI Hub converse? One can access it without logging in. (thanks @andy for pointing this out!)
this is on AI Hub UAT. thanks to @Adam for actually finding it hahaha
ah somehow this becomes the sample file in Converse in UAT.... @Balaram when you see this can you update UAT please
While running the UAT tests, I removed this conversation for guest. I will check on this

I have removed the conversation from the UAT environment.

On further debugging, this was created yesterday around 2pm IST.

I will keep an eye on this.

Maybe we can move the aihub_guest credentials in every environment to a different vault in 1pass with limited access so people don’t accidentally log in as the aihub guest user. I’ve done the same by accident on one of the environments. Then we can force logout that user from all environments
